response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds a significant value to me, reflecting its unique qualities and craftsmanship. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an offer to you at a price of $950,000. I believe this is a fair and competitive price that reflects the true value of the product while ensuring a reasonable profit for us. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am looking forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
